Text: Confirm ABE Book Order Les Annees The Advanced Book Exchange has forwarded the following order This is only a confirmation of your order the book seller will contact you shortly to confirm this books availability No response is required Author Bony DAnne Title Les Annees Publisher Paris Editions Du Regard BookId Price Volumes cm pp hundreds of bw and colour ills Cloth Slipcase Terms We accept all major credit cards Payment can also be made through our Giro account To Chichester Gallery East St Chichester SXY United Kingdom PO HX Fax Email Your comments were as follows is this book available This mail was created Nov and postmarked Nov

Re Confirm ABE Book Order Les Annees Jeffrey Thanks for your email I am very sorry but we sold this book the day after we received your order We did not realise that it was someone else ordering it and presumed it was from the same initial inquiry However we should be able to locate another copy at the same price if you would still like it Once again many apologies Kind Regards Nick Higbee
Re ABE Book Order Les Annees Jeff Shankman Thanks for your email I am pleased to tell you that the book is available Kind Regards Nick Higbee Chichester Gallery Art Books
